name: React - The Complete Guide
instructorBio: Meet Mike, prefessional teacher with 20 years of experience
shortDescription: Learn React by building Full stack application
longDescription: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It was developed by Facebook and is now maintained by Facebook and a community of individual developers and companies. React allows developers to build reusable UI components and manage the state of an application in a way that makes it easy to reason about and debug. It also integrates well with other libraries and frameworks, such as Redux for state management and React Router for client-side routing. React is widely used in web development and has been used to build many popular websites and web applications, such as Facebook, Instagram, and Airbnb.
instructoDescription: Simona Gareth is an expert software developer with over ten years of web development experience. She has experience with some of the largest names in technology and is an authority in React. Simona is an accomplished educator who loves to impart her expertise to others. React - The Complete Guide, one of her well-known online courses on the subject, has helped thousands of students all over the world understand this potent framework. Simona is renowned for her captivating teaching style and capacity to simplify complicated ideas into lessons that are simple to grasp. She is dedicated to remaining current with the most recent advancements in the area and has a Master's in Computer Science from the University of California, Berkeley. Simona likes to read about emerging technology and go to trade shows in her free time.

name: Influence - Psychology of Persuasion

test.question: What is the difference between descriptive and inferential statistics?
options: Descriptive statistics summarize and describe data, while inferential statistics use data to make inferences about a population
Inferential statistics summarize and describe data, while descriptive statistics use data to make inferences about a population
Both types of statistics involve summarizing and describing data
Neither type of statistics involves summarizing and describing data
